message: I understand you wanting to be fair, but I'm on a tighter deadline. This offer considers that.
Considering your deadline, I'll meet you halfway from my initial offer
I appreciate the movement, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't go below 570k
This is my final offer. I need to secure a decent amount to meet my financial obligations. I believe this is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
I'm not budging much, the inflation is on your side of the risk
